content:
Hi all! I will be out of the office for the holiday tomorrow; a draft agenda is here in case you end up with quorum:
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20161123_FMG_concall
Tomorrow's going to be tough for me. Who *will* make it?
I *might* make it, but more probably not. Do we have any agenda items that need dealing with this week?
The only one I know of is a vote on a NIB that came through the email list about 5 days ago (from Ken). If we could evote in that then we could probably delay...

Ah just reading the message from Anne - how will we start the Goto meeting?

and - who will be there?
I can make the meeting, but wonder if we should just e-vote the NIB and cancel.
It would be cleaner to have a 5 minute call to deal with if we can get quorum.
Do you know the rules around the evote? Sounds like a plan though...
Well perhaps we can dial in & see how it goes? I have to go jump on a plane - back in a few hours...
evote takes a week... right? I agree with Paul that a very short meeting to have a vote would be good... I can make it.
You would really want it completed for TSC on Monday as the final content deadline is the following Sunday.

so looks like we're going to have a short meeting with a single agenda item - to review the NIB. I'm somewhat confused exactly what we're looking at as the email trail is not clear (to me) just what we're doing (they refer to resource proposals, that don't appear to be in the wiki)- hopefully someone who can make the call will have clarity! I'm currently in london so AFAIK the time will be 9pm London time (=10am NZ time). Unfortunately we don't have the meeting time in the wiki...

unfortunately we weren't quorate so were unable to approve the PSS's, but would have had issues anyway as they haven't been approved by the committee. I've reached out to RCRIM co-chairs, and provided they can approve before the next FMG meeting we should be good to pick it up then.
